resources.string: Whip up to-do lists in seconds—errands, big goals, or tiny tasks. Clear your list, earn points, and feel that sweet, sweet satisfaction.

Welcome to the leaderboard life. Finish your to-dos, earn points, climb the ranks, and claim those bragging rights. Finally, productivity pays off—in pixels, pride, and a little bit of friendly chaos.

Build your own leaderboard, name it something absurd (we dare you), and invite your friends, family or work crew. Compete to complete and find out who’s the real productivity MVP—no more hiding behind “I’ll do it later.”
You’ve got the lists. You’ve got the leaderboards. Now it’s time to check off tasks like a legend. Let the productivity games begin!
